intru_solid: Protected against solid objects over 50mm, e.g. accidental touch by hands.
moist_protect: Protected against vertically falling drops of water, e.g. condensation.

intru_solid: Protected against solid objects over 12mm, e.g. fingers.
moist_protect: Protected against direct sprays of water up to 15 degrees from the vertical.

intru_solid: Protected against solid objects over 2.5mm, e.g. tools & wires.
moist_protect: Protected against direct sprays of water up to 60 degrees from the vertical.

intru_solid: Protected against solid objects over 1mm, e.g. wires & nails.
moist_protect: Protected against water splashed from all directions, limited ingress permitted.

intru_solid: Protected against dust limited ingress, no harmful deposits.
moist_protect: Protected against low pressure jets of water from all directions, limited ingress permitted.
Protected against strong jets of water, e.g. on ships deck, limited ingress permitted.
Protected against the effects of temporary immersion in water
Protected against the effects of continuous immersion in water having regard to specific conditions
Protected against powerful high temperature water jets
